bans.gloabl: You are banned from useing this bot!
bans.guild: You cant use this bot on this server!
bans.reggeltGlobal: You are banned from useing the morning feature! (globaly)
bans.reggeltGuild: You are banned from useing the morning feature! (%!GUILD%!)

reggelt.onCooldown: You are on cooldown! Please wait until %!CD%!.
reggelt.noSend: Missing permission! I need **Send Messages** to function correctly

reggeltUpdate.editSend: You cannot edit messages in this channel

leaderboard.notOneTwenty: Please use a number between 1 and 20

help.title: Reggeltbot help
help.f11: It tells you how many times you greeted the #reggelt channel (or [here](https://reggeltbot.com/count?i=%!DCID%!) You can also view it)
help.setlang2: Options: say, reggelt, full | Lang: Your language code.  For example: (%!ALLLANG%!)
help.f31: Name a chennel **%!CHANNEL%!** and you're done
help.f51: If you encounter any problems while using the bot you can report [here](https://github.com/zal1000/reggeltbot/issues)

fact.addF: You can add your fact [here](https://facts.zal1000.com/) (to display discord info, link your discord account [here](https://dclink.zal1000.com/))

cooldown.on: You have to wait %!TIME%! to say morning again!
